thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic location in the city
thread.title_full: Fantastic location in the city - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jon W
title: Fantastic location in the city
text:
This hotel is situated very close to the Gloucester Rd tube station and is therefore very convenient to get around the city.
The hotel is clean and the staff are friendly. There is a 'secret garden' behind which is a great retreat from the noises of the very busy Cromwell and Gloucester Roads.
A relaxed atmosphere throughout makes for a lovely trip to London
